alert.note: Alert for Central Highlands; Guadalupe County; Union County (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued December 01 at 2:24PM MST until December 02 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 5 AM TO 5 PM MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...West winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts up to 60 mph expected. * WHERE...Central Highlands, Guadalupe County, and Union County. * WHEN...From 5 AM to 5 PM MST Friday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles from dangerous crosswinds and lower visibility from blowing dust along I-40 and area highways.
info.instruction: Take action to secure trash cans, lawn furniture, and other loose or lightweight outdoor objects. Extremely hazardous driving conditions can be expected, especially for motorists in high profile vehicles who should consider delaying travel.

area.areaDesc: Central Highlands; Guadalupe County; Union County
